Class arjuna.JavaSim.Statistics.Quantile 

java.lang.Object

                   |
                   +----arjuna.JavaSim.Statistics.PrecisionHistogram
                           |
                           +----arjuna.JavaSim.Statistics.Quantile
public class Quantile
extends PrecisionHistogram
Provides a means of obtaining the p-quantile of a distribution, i.e., the value below which p-percent of the distribution lies.

Quantile()
Create with 95% probability.
Quantile(double)
Create with the specified probability.

getValue()
Return the p-quantile.
print()
Print out the quantile information.
range()
Return the p-quantile percentage.

Quantile 
  public Quantile()
Create with 95% probability.

Quantile 
  public Quantile(double q) throws IllegalArgumentException
Create with the specified probability. If the probability it greater than 100% (1.0) or less than or equal to 0% then throw an exception.

getValue 
  public double getValue()
Return the p-quantile.

range 
  public double range()
Return the p-quantile percentage.

print 
  public void print()
Print out the quantile information.

Overrides:
print in class PrecisionHistogram
